Class RandomAttackEvent

java.lang.Object
com.arena.dual_arena.models.hazard.RandomAttackEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackFireball, AttackZoneCircle
public abstract class RandomAttackEvent extends Object
Abstract class defining a framework for handling random attack events in the game. It uses a Timeline to schedule attacks after random intervals.

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomAttackEvent

      protected RandomAttackEvent(double dt, double dtm)
      Constructs a RandomAttackEvent with specified drop time and minimum drop time.
      Parameters:
      dt - The maximum time in seconds that the actual drop time can vary.
      dtm - The minimum time in seconds before the first attack is triggered.

  • Method Details

    • startRandomAttack

      protected void startRandomAttack()
      Starts the attack sequence by initializing and playing a single execution Timeline. The timeline triggers an attack after a random delay that is computed based on the dropTime and dropTimeMinimum values.

    • triggerAttackEvent

      protected abstract void triggerAttackEvent()
      Abstract method to define specific attack events. Implementations of this method should specify what happens when an attack is triggered.
